casebody.data:
James T. Swift, et al., respondents, v. Thomas L. James, as assignee, &c., impleaded, &c., appellant. Decided December 1, 1884. Appeal from order denying defendants’ motion for a bill of particulars. Stern and Myers, for appellant. Edward M. Shepard, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick Ch. J., Van Vorst and Freedman, JJ.

Opinion

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with costs.
